sources.title: Trust Nobody (CRIME COMEDY in German, watch comedy in full length, action comedy in German)
Trust Nobody (Kompletter KRIMI auf Deutsch, Spielfilme in voller Länge anschauen, Krimi Komödie)

metadata.Plot: Trust Nobody is a 90-minute Drama base on a young hustler name Bricks who just got release from doing 4 years in prison. Knowing that he did time for a few notorious crime figures, he wastes no time calling in a few favors to get his self back on top. Bricks put together an army of reckless hustlers and hardcore hoods, before long the money begins to flow and he began to run a empire, everything in his life was going great until he meets Sugah Larue. Sugah Larue is gorgeous with game and street smart. Doing his journey in the streets events are unfolding and he finds out that his going to prison was a set up and the people he love the most really have no love for him at all to the point they want him dead which place him in a position to strap up and seek revenge on those who crossed him. What he doesn't know is that the people he is searching for may very well be in his own organization. Trust nobody take place in the hard ghetto streets of the city of Milwaukee. "A young hustler thirst for power can make him destroy his own family, and a woman's greed can cause her to do the unthinkable."
metadata.Actors: Ciera Angelia, Keenan Bethly-Kay, Charles Burgess
